data.text:
You don't look so good.
Take care of those wounds before you bleed out.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Where the hell did he get the materia!?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Hey, careful now! This guy's no boot.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Drop the weapon and get down!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: He's alone! We can take him!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text:
Gonna throw your sword at 'em?
Let the man with the gun go to work!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: These tin cans ain't got nothing on me!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Oh yeah!? How about I aim for your head!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hah! We can take this hunk of junk!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
That "hunk of junk" is a heavy weapons platform.
If we rush in...we die.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Need to hit it with magic.
That should give us an opening.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let's pin it down! Give it all you've got!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Of course, it just had to get back up.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
So we knock it down again.
No time to complain.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Don't need to tell me twice!
I'm gonna enjoy this!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Funny way to ask for help.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Don't just stand there! Help me out, damn it!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This is coming outta your pay, merc!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think it's time to bring out the big guns!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
We don't have time for this shit!
The clock's ticking!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Cool it. Five seconds is all we need.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey! How the hell do we fight this thing?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's got reinforced armor plating─but the internals can be overloaded.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hell yeah! You see the damage that did!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We barely scratched the damn thing!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Didn't I tell you to use magic!?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Thought you were full of shit.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think whatever you want─just do it!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Hello? Lightning magic?
You even know how to use materia?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: 'Course I know how to use materia! What kind of stupid question is that? Quit rushing me!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta win this one for the planet...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Pretty quick for a heap of scrap!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You turning tail on me, merc!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The hell!? We got a scorpion to squash!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: There's no point trying to run.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: A barrier? Never seen this defense system before...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: So what's your brilliant plan, genius?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: There's gotta be a weak point somewhere...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Then hurry the hell up and find it!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Oh, now he remembers. Don't keep me waiting in suspense next time!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: There! Attack it from the rear!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Aight, SOLDIER boy! Show me what you got!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta be a way to break through...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: If we don't change it up soon, this thing's gonna kill us both!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It wouldn't be much of a weapon if it went down easy.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Dammit! Gotta do something about that barrier first!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now! Hit it hard and fast!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Ohhh, you're in for it now!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now's our chance! Give it everything you've got!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'm putting an end to this shit!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You really think that's gonna stop me!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, quit screwing around! This thing ain't playing!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The hell you hanging so far back for?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Sure you can hit it from there?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Watch the tail! You don't want to be hit by that laser!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Don't get hit! Take cover behind that debris!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Wanna get shot? Be my guest!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's readying that laser. Don't try to run for it!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I know, I know! All I gotta do is hide, right!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If you know, then do it!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey, it's doing that thing again!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Mechs don't get tired. Or complain.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
And you're getting tired of my complaining, huh?
Solid copy!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When you get comfortable, you get hurt.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Are you for real!? You gotta backtalk me every damn time!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Again with the laser!? I swear this dumbass mech hasn't learned a damn thing!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And it won't─it's bound to its programming.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It ain't easy being a mech, huh!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now! Get in there and do some damage!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's wide open! Gonna light it up!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: How is this thing still running!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Been a while since I had to go all out...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Where do you think you're going?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Aw, hell, what's it doing now!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: An auto-repair unit? Dammit─we gotta take it out quick or we're screwed!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Oh, I am way ahead of you, merc!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
Gotta time our attacks just right!
Hold out until you spot an opening!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's down! Rain hell on it!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's not gonna go down easy! Focus!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You focus, SOLDIER boy! You ain't gotta worry 'bout me missing my shot!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When I get my chance, I'm gonna blow this bastard the hell up! And that's a promise!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No time to waste─let's take it out quick!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey, you still with me!? We better bring the heat─and quick!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I ain't about to quit after coming this far!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No way in hell you're taking us down!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah! How you like them apples!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Leg disabled! It won't be jumping around for a while.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
There goes another!
Now's our chance to do some real damage!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Oh, I got your leg! You ain't going nowhere now!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
And down goes another!
Ohh, you're in for it now!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Why you gotta pick on me!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I gonna have to do this all by myself!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Looks like the scorpion's taken a shine to you!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey! Ain't there something you wanna say to yours truly?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When people save your ass, you might consider thanking 'em for it.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Shit. Was just about to get you out.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Wasn't expecting you to do jack...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Must be strong if it can pick you up...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Whew! Sure am glad I paid you a fortune and then some!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You think about leaving me here...?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Not as good as I'd be if you'd actually tried to help me out!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Try helping next time if you give a shit!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Huh!? You running out on me?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Need to do something about these wounds...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Dammit. Need to heal up soon...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gotta heal up when I have the chance.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey, you really gonna make me deal with this on my own?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Thought you SOLDIERs were tougher than this!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Quit napping and get your ass back up!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Can keep going if I heal up...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
We gonna let this thing keep pushing us around?
I don't think so!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
You think I care about a few cuts and bruises?
'Cause I don't!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I ain't going down fighting a goddamn scorpion!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta heal up quick or I'm in serious shit...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
Ugh, getting woozy...
Need to patch myself up ASAP...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey! Want me to leave you behind?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gonna say something smart? Or did that ass whooping make you forget?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
Get your shit together, man!
You're a badass professional SOLDIER, ain'tcha!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Aw, damn! That one had to hurt!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Going in for the kill! Follow my lead!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Been saving something special for your ugly ass.
You ready!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Aww yeah! Time for some hardcore payback!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
So what's SOLDIER boy's deal?
Is he one of us now?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Still, he's a professional─unlike the rest of us.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: And he isn't a SOLDIER anymore.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text:
C'mon, nobody'd do something this crazy
just for money.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: They may not think you're a true believer, but you know what I think?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text:
You'd better be worth the money, merc.
Every last gil.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Not so fast. We've got company.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text:
SOLDIERs may attack on command,
but I hear they make good guard dogs too.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Bet you've seen a few reactors.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So how do we get to the bridge above mako storage?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Ain't holding out on me, are you?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Have it your way, mutt. We can do this with you, or we can do this without you.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Stamp scared to bite the hand that fed him?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Or is he a loyal little doggy!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
Different reactor, different layout.
Depends when it was built.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Never seen one like this, but I'll manage.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's a good thing I know someone who can get us the passcodes.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Pity no one else at command will talk to us, but what can you do?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: It's not really my business, but are you guys close?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: These sewer rats appear to call themselves Avalanche, sir.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: We are currently investigating whether they belong to the same group that made the attempt on your life.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Rest assured, our inquiries will not take much longer.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: This pump's sole purpose is to drain the planet dry.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It doesn't rest and it doesn't care!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Mako is the lifeblood of our world.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The hell you think's gonna happen when it's all gone, huh!? Answer me!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
While you sleep, while you eat, while you shit─
it's here, sucking up mako.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You do realize what mako is, don't you?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The planet bleeds green like you and me bleed red.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You gonna stand there and pretend you can't hear the planet crying out in pain?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'd worry less about the planet and more about the next five seconds.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Our lives are on the line now.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You listening, merc? One false move...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Well, so much for having Cloud do all the fighting.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: There are some places a sword just can't reach...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Just...bear with him for me, would you?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: That's our target. The reactor core.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Gotta set the bomb at the bottom.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: All right. Let's see if little Stamp really can bite the hand that feeds...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Prove to me you're the man Tifa says you are.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Never said I was. I'm just here for the paycheck.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hah! That long enough for you?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Damn thing showed you how it's done!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Do I look okay!? Help a girl out, would ya!?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
Hey! We'll link up over there!
Look after Jessie!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Find us a way outta here!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I've got SOLDIER boy with me!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Come on...come on, come on, come on!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If I couldn't, believe me, you'd be the first to know.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I'll take that as a yes.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Real joy to work with though.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Real joy to look at too.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Looks are what people notice first.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Guess I'm not on the same page as "people."
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: I'd say you're not even reading the same book.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
Hey, Cloud! Elevator's over there!
Catch up soon!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: He always knows just what to say!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Those things'll hurt more than your pride if you're careless. They'll cut you down to size and then some.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: ...But I'm guessing you've done this kind of thing before.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Yeah. Figure out the timing of the lasers.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Then make a move when they cycle off.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'll go first. Nothing like a little danger to get the blood pumping!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Just keep those baby blues of yours on me!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: They don't call those things sweepers for nothing. They can wipe out a whole squad in seconds.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Not if you wipe the floor with them first.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Goddamn... I can practically taste the mako in here... Hurry it up!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Heads up, boys─the end's in sight.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
I leave the rest in your capable hands.
Good luck!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
I leave the rest in your capable hands.
Good luck!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
We don't have a lot of time here!
Pick up the pace, people!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Like a walk in the park, huh?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You SOLDIERs sure can take a beating.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You sure you were a SOLDIER?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I had no idea you were such a klutz.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Um, you have a fetish or something?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: There's a fine line between being daring and being dumb.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Okay, let's see what's up next!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
...And it's more of the same.
Come on, then.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Well, I'm glad that's over with.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: And we're almost at our objective!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Wow, they've almost got the door.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text:
We're doing this. We're really doing it.
Man...I think I'm gonna be sick...
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: I'll secure our escape route, okay?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: You go on and catch up with the others.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Looks like the elevator's on another floor.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
Don't you worry.
Biggs'll have the door open soon.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
Security's only gonna get tighter, so be ready.
We can't afford any more mistakes.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: My heart's pounding like a jackhammer!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
Hah! More like excited.
I've been dreaming about this for years!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You think, if we fell in, we'd sink right down to the bottom? To the planet's core?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No, the pump would suck us back up.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Don't those things know when to give up?
Cloud, make sure they don't bother us anymore, will you?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
Not that way!
Down the ladder, dummy!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
Aw, you're choosing me over the reactor?
That's sweet, but I'll wait my turn. Go blow her mind.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
SOLDIER: First Class.
Doesn't go into the twenties.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
The hell you talking about?
I mean your age, not your goddamn rank!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Though, for all I know, a SOLDIER's rank could be the same as his age...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Mm-hmm. Guess that'd make you a one-year-old, huh?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah, let's do this... Let's do this!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Wedge should be covering our way out!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
This route should lead us straight to Barret!
Probably!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I think I see an exit. Come on!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text:
Don't look back!
Let's go, let's go, let's go!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Shut up and move. You're not helping.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Shut up and climb. You're not helping.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
It keeps me focused!
I'll freak out if I don't talk!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Let's go! The others are waiting!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta get the hell outta here ASAP...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Ugh! This is all we need!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
Heads up!
We got a whole lotta company!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Whoa! Ain't you a feisty one!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Like a rook seeing his first action...
data.speaker: Cloud
